page.title: 07What do our Mums do?
page.content: We found that one third of our Mums stayed at home. The most popular paid job was cleaning, either offices , schools or private houses. The next most popular was working in local factories, usually around the Ashbourne area. Some Mums were outworkers for those factories, paid for doing work at home. There was a great variety after that-nurses, shop workers, caterers and quite a few who helped their husbands with book keeping if they were self employed. Most mothers said they would like to work. They said that they either did'nt have the qualifications to get good jobs or lacked transport to get to the areas where the jobs existed.
